content: **june 25 2013 ** italian version now available thanks to ajroldi 1 **june 27 2013 ** german version now available thanks to amberschiwi 2 an easy top-down pullover that has the added interest of a garter stitch collar placket and edging this is a project that you can make over and over again as your baby grows using a heavier or lighter weight yarn is an easy way to size the pattern up or down the finished chest measurements are 19 20 21 in the gauge given in addition to a size 5 3 5mm 16 circular needle for the body you ll also need size 5 3 5mm double pointed needles to work the sleeves in the round 6/29/12 telemark pullover 2 0 3 is now available with a range of sizes 3 months through 10 years 1 http //www ravelry com/people/ajroldi 2 http //www ravelry com/people/amberschiwi 3 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/telemark-pullover-20
